author: anonymous2
post: I would say this is a pretty good job of falsifying the shroud. He produced the negative image and the 3 D effect. The blood is not that hard to duplicate. If these properties have been duplicated then it’s no longer “miraculous”. I wonder if this shuts down Isabel Piczek’s claim of a event horizin taking place..
title: It’s a negative. It’s 3D. Yes? Maybe? Sort Of?
